<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements UnrolledInstAnalyzer class. It&#39;s used for predicting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// potential effects that loop unrolling might have, such as enabling constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagation and other optimizations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;LOOPUNROLLANALYZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;LOOPUNROLLANALYZER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/apint-h">llvm/ADT/APInt.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">llvm/Analysis/ScalarEvolution.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instvisitor-h">llvm/IR/InstVisitor.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This class is used to get an estimate of the optimization effects that we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could get from complete loop unrolling. It comes from the fact that some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loads might be replaced with concrete constant values and that could trigger</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a chain of instruction simplifications.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g. we might have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   int a&#91;&#93; = &#123;0, 1, 0&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   v = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for (i = 0; i &lt; 3; i ++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     v += b&#91;i&#93;&#42;a&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we completely unroll the loop, we would get:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   v = b&#91;0&#93;&#42;a&#91;0&#93; + b&#91;1&#93;&#42;a&#91;1&#93; + b&#91;2&#93;&#42;a&#91;2&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Which then will be simplified to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   v = b&#91;0&#93;&#42; 0 + b&#91;1&#93;&#42; 1 + b&#91;2&#93;&#42; 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And finally:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   v = b&#91;1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unrolledinstanalyzer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unrolledinstanalyzer/#a4ec16ace3e6eb191846d4d859468adcb">UnrolledInstAnalyzer</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a>&lt;UnrolledInstAnalyzer, bool&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">SimplifiedAddress &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A cache of pointer bases and constant-folded offsets corresponding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to GEP (or derived from GEP) instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In order to find the base pointer one needs to perform non-trivial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// traversal of the corresponding SCEV expression, so it&#39;s good to have the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// results saved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, SimplifiedAddress&gt;</a> SimplifiedAddresses;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SCEV expression corresponding to number of currently simulated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;IterationNumber;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// While we walk the loop instructions, we build up and maintain a mapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of simplified values specific to this iteration.  The idea is to propagate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// any special information we have about loads that can be replaced with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// constants after complete unrolling, and account for likely simplifications</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// post-unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
